definition: A term commonly used to refer to the anatomical structure found on the end of a limb, typically associated with certain animals. It is often utilized to describe the paw or foot of a specific creature, serving as a vital part of their locomotion and interaction with their environment.

examples.german: Die Katze wuschelt sich mit der Pfote das Gesicht.
examples.english: The cat washes its face with its paw.

examples.german: Der Hund gab mir seine Pfote.
examples.english: The dog gave me its paw.

examples.german: Die Pfote des BÃ¤ren war riesig.
Die Katze kratzte mich mit ihrer Pfote.
examples.english: The cat scratched me with its paw.

examples.german: Der Welpe spielte mit seiner Pfote.
examples.english: The puppy played with its paw.
